code: import React from"react";import{GameOverContainer,TitleContainer,GameOverButtons,Button}from"./styles";import Title from"./title";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{characterActions}from"@/redux/character";import{infoActions}from"@/redux/info";import{uiActions}from"@/redux/ui";import{statsActions}from"@/redux/stats";var GameOver=function GameOver(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var setGameOver=function setGameOver(){dispatch(characterActions.resetCharacter());dispatch(infoActions.resetInfo());dispatch(uiActions.resetUi());dispatch(statsActions.resetStats());};var continueBuild=function continueBuild(){dispatch(uiActions.continueBuild());};return React.createElement(GameOverContainer,null,React.createElement(TitleContainer,null,React.createElement(Title,null)),React.createElement(GameOverButtons,null,React.createElement(Button,{onClick:continueBuild},"No, continue experience"),React.createElement(Button,{primary:true,onClick:setGameOver},"Yes, stop this!")));};export default GameOver;
